title: The Herd-HOUR 1-NCAAFB, Damian Lillard, Lakers, Raiders
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-NCAAFB, Damian Lillard, Lakers, Raiders
description:
Colin talks about college football falling apart, the greatness of Damian Lillard, the Lakers in the first round of the playoffs, and why the Raiders will have a bad season.

Guest: Nick Wright
